text: The Violin Concerto in D major, Op. 77 is a work for orchestra and solo violin by Johannes Brahms. He completed the concerto in the summer of 1878. It was written for Joseph Joachim. The concerto premiered in Leipzig on 1 January 1879. ==References== * Woodstra, Chris, et al. 2005. All Music Guide to Classical Music. All Media Guide, LLC. p. 198\. . Category:Compositions by Johannes Brahms Brahms Category:Compositions in D major
title: Violin Concerto (Brahms)
